Participation is voluntary and you will have the opportunity to decide whether or not to disclose information to the Website.

You may also cancel your free email subscription by following the instructions provided on the Website or in the newsletter or email us at website@vikings.nfl.com, admin@vikingscontests.com, admin@vikingsnewsletter.com.

Your personally identifiable information may be used to contact you for winner notification, prize delivery confirmation or other related purposes, (see the rules of each contest for details about how your personal information will be used). We may also ask your permission to allow us to publicly post some of your information on the Website, such as on a winner's page, in the event you win a contest or sweepstakes.
